public static void recursion(long total, ArrayList<Long> result) {

if (total == 1) {
if (!result.contains(1L)) result.add(1L);

return;
} else {
for (long i = 1; i <= total; i++) {
if ((i == 1) && result.contains(1L)) continue;
ArrayList<Long> newList = (ArrayList<Long>) (result.clone());
newList.add(Long.valueOf(i));
if (total % i != 0) {
continue;
}
recursion(total / i, newList);
}
}
}

public class Iteration {

public static void recursion(long total, ArrayList<Long> result){

if (total == 1){
result.add(1L);
System.out.println(result);
return;
}else {
for(long i = 2; i <= total; i ++){
ArrayList<Long> newList = (ArrayList<Long>)(result.clone());
newList.add(Long.valueOf(i));
if(total%i !=0){
continue;
}
recursion(total/i, newList);
}
}
}

public static void main(String[] args){
long total = 8;
recursion(total, new ArrayList<Long>());
}
}

#include <vector>

using namespace std;

// è¾“å‡ºå‡½æ•°
void PrintResult(vector<int> &Result)
{
for (size_t i = 0; i < Result.size(); ++i)
{

}
cout << endl;
}

//æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨æŸå€¼
bool IsExit(vector<int> &Result, int value)
{
vector<int>::iterator result = std::find(Result.begin(), Result.end(), value);
if (result == Result.end())
{
return false;
}
else
{
return true;
}
}

//æ•´æ•°åˆ†è§£
void RecursionAlgo(int Num, vector<int> &Result)
{
if (Num == 1)
{
PrintResult(Result);
return;
}
for (int i = 1; i <= Num; ++i)
{
//åˆ¤æ–­1æ˜¯å¦åœ¨è§£ä¸­
if (IsExit(Result, 1))
{
if (i == 1)
{
continue;
}
}
if (Num%i == 0)
{
vector<int> newResult = Result;
newResult.push_back(i);

RecursionAlgo(Num/i, newResult);
}
}
}

int _tmain(int argc, _TCHAR* argv[])
{

import copy

def prod_factors(num, result=[]):
if num == 1:
print('x'.join([str(_) for _ in result]))
if 1 not in result:
result.append(1)
print('x'.join([str(_) for _ in result]))
elif num < 0:
return
else:
for i in range(1, num+1):
if (i == 1 and i not in result) or (i !=1 and num % i == 0):
newresult = copy.copy(result)
newresult.append(i)
prod_factors(num/i, newresult)

static void getFactorization(long product, ArrayList<Long> result) {
for (int i = 2; i <= product / 2; i++) {
if (0 == product % i) {
ArrayList<Long> newResult = (ArrayList<Long>) result.clone();
newResult.add((long) i);
getFactorization(product / i, newResult);
newResult.add(product / i);
System.out.println(newResult);
}
}
}

import copy
def get(num, result=[]):
sum = 1
for index in result:
sum = sum * index
if sum == num:
print(result)
if 1 not in result:
result.append(1)
print(result)
return
elif sum > num:
return
else:

while i<=num:

continue
new_result = copy.copy(result)
new_result.append(i)
i = i+1
get(num, new_result)

import copy

def get_mul_factor(num,result=[]):
if(num==1):
total=copy.copy(result)
if 1 not in total:
total.append(1)
print(total)
return
elif(num<1):
return
else:
n=list(range(num+1))
n.reverse()
if 1 in result:
m=range(len(n)-2)
else:
m=range(len(n)-1)
for i in m:
new_result=copy.copy(result)
if num%n[i]==0:

void RecursionAlgo(int Totalmoney, vector<int> &Select, vector<int> &Result)
{
//æ¯æ¬¡é€’å½’éœ€è¦ç”¨æ€»é‡‘é¢å‡å»ä½¿ç”¨çš„é¢é¢ï¼Œç›´åˆ°Totalmoney=0ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºæ‰¾åˆ°è§£

class Scratch {
public static Set<String> results = new HashSet<>();

public static void recursion(long total, ArrayList<Long> result) {
if (total == 1) {
if (result.size() == 1) {
result.add(1L);
}
if (result.size() > 2) {
result.remove(Long.valueOf(1));
}
String x = result.stream().map(Object::toString).collect(Collectors.joining("x"));
results.add(x);
} else {
for (int i = 1; i <= total; i++) {
if (i == 1 && result.contains(1L)) {
continue;
}
if (total % i != 0) {
continue;
}
ArrayList<Long> newResult = ((ArrayList) result.clone());
newResult.add((long) i);
recursion(total / i, newResult);
}
}
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
recursion(8, new ArrayList<>());
results.forEach(System.out::println);
}
}

#to get the factor of an integer, we can search recursively, consider with 1 and without 1 in the result
def getFactors(self, n: int) -> List[List[int]]:
#considering using backtrack recursively find the possible combinations
#always consider edge case
#below is the code to consider 1 in the result and consider 1x8 and 8x1 as two answers

ans = []

def backtrack(path, target):
#ending condition
if target == 1 and 1 in path:
ans.append(path.copy())
elif target == 1 and 1 not in path:
ans.append(path.copy() + [1])
elif target < 0:
return
else:

#start backtrack
for i in range(1, target + 1):
if (i == 1 and i not in path) or (i != 1 and target % i == 0):
path.append(i)
backtrack(path, target // i)
path.pop()

backtrack([], n)
return ans

package main

import (
"fmt"
)

type slice struct {
data []int
}
type list struct {
data [][]int
}



func main() {
r := combinationSum([]int{1, 2, 5, 10}, 10)
fmt.Println(r)
}

func combinationSum(candidates []int, target int) [][]int {
if len(candidates) == 0 {
return [][]int{}
}
path := &slice{data: make([]int, 0)}
ret := &list{data: make([][]int, 0)}
def(candidates, target, path, ret, 0, len(candidates))
return ret.data

}
func def(candidates []int, target int, path *slice, ret *list, index int, length int) {
if target < 0 {
return
}
if target == 0 {
ls := make([]int, len(path.data))
copy(ls, path.data)
ret.data = append(ret.data, ls)
//fmt.Println(path.data,"-------------")
return
}
for i := index; i < length; i++ {
path.data = append(path.data, candidates[i])

def(candidates, target-candidates[i], path, ret, i, length)
path.data = path.data[:len(path.data)-1]
}

}

class Solution {

recursive(false, num, initval);

private:
void recursive(bool hasOne, int num, vector<int>& arr) {
if (num == 1) {
// æ”¾è¿›æ‰“å°é˜Ÿåˆ—
if (arr.size() == 1 || !hasOne) {
arr.push_back(1);
}
printArr.push_back(arr);
return;
}
int i = 2;
for(; i <= num; i++) {
vector<int> unknownIfExistingOne = arr;
if (num % i == 0) {
if (!hasOne) {
vector<int> addOne = arr;
addOne.push_back(1);
addOne.push_back(i);
recursive(true, num / i, addOne);
}
unknownIfExistingOne.push_back(i);
recursive(hasOne, num / i, unknownIfExistingOne); // ä¿æŒåŸæ¥çš„ç‰¹å®šç‰¹æ€§ä¸ä¸¢
}
else
continue;
}
}

}

public static void recursion(long total, ArrayList<Long> result) {
if (total < 0) {
throw new IllegalArgumentException();
} else if (total == 1) {
if (!result.contains(1L)) {
result.add(1L);
}
System.out.println(result);
} else {
for (int i = 1; i <= total; i++) {
if (total % i == 0) {
if (i == 1 && result.contains(1L)) {
continue;
}
ArrayList<Long> temp = (ArrayList<Long>) result.clone();
temp.add((long) i);
recursion(total / i, temp);
}
}
}
}

def fn(n):
if n == 1:
return [(1,)]
results = []
for i in range(1, n // 2 + 1):
if n % i == 0:
div = n // i
all_combinations = fn(i)
for comb in all_combinations:
results.append((div,) + comb)
results.append(comb + (div,))
results.append((n,))
return set(results)

newResult.add(i);
get__(totalValue / i, newResult);
}
}
}

public class DivisorResolve {

private void resolve(Integer num, List<Integer> combination, boolean hasOne) {

if (num == 1 && hasOne) {
System.out.println(combination);
return;
}

int start = hasOne ? 2 : 1;
for (int i = start; i <= num; i++) {
List<Integer> temp = new ArrayList<>(combination);
if (num % i == 0) {
temp.add(i);
resolve(num / i, temp, i == 1 ? true : hasOne);
}
}
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
DivisorResolve res = new DivisorResolve();
List<Integer> combination = new ArrayList<>();
res.resolve(12, combination, false);
}
}

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

vector<int> org_rewards{10, 5, 2, 1};
int num = 0;
void show_vector(vector<int> &result) {
cout << ++num << " : ";
for (int &v : result) {
cout << v << " , ";
}
cout << endl;
}

void get_groups(int total_reward, vector<int> result,
const vector<int> &rewards) {
if (total_reward == 0) {
show_vector(result);
} else if (total_reward > 0) {
for (int i = 0; i < rewards.size(); i++) {
vector<int> new_result = result;
new_result.push_back(rewards[i]);
get_groups(total_reward - rewards[i], new_result,
vector<int>(rewards.begin() + i, rewards.end()));
}
}
}

func recursion(n int, result []int) {
if n == 1 {
if !contain(result, 1) {
result = append(result, 1)
}
fmt.Println(result)
return
} else {
for i := 1; i <= n; i++ {
if i == 1 && contain(result, 1) {
continue
}
new_result := make([]int, len(result))
copy(new_result, result)
if n%i != 0 {
continue
}
new_result = append(new_result, i)
recursion(n/i, new_result)
}
}
}

package cn.algorithm;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class Recursion02 {

public static int[] rewards;

static int count = 0;

public static void get(int total, ArrayList<Integer> result) {
if (total == 1) {
if(result.size() == 1){
result.add(1);
}
System.out.println(result);
System.out.println();
count++;
return;
} else {
for (int i = 0; i < rewards.length; i++) {
//System.err.println(total+","+rewards[i]+","+i+","+rewards.length);
if (rewards[i] == 1) {
ArrayList<Integer> newResult = (ArrayList<Integer>) result.clone();
newResult.add(rewards[i]);
newResult.add(total);
get(1, newResult);
} else if (rewards[i] > 0 && total % rewards[i] == 0) {
int newTotal = total / rewards[i];
ArrayList<Integer> newResult = (ArrayList<Integer>) result.clone();
newResult.add(rewards[i]);
get(newTotal, newResult);

}
}
}
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
int total = 100;
rewards = new int[total];
for (int i = 1; i <= total; i++) {
rewards[i - 1] = i;
}
System.out.println();
ArrayList<Integer> result = new ArrayList<>();
get(total, result);
System.out.println(count);
}
}

package main

import (
"fmt"
"math"
"strconv"
"strings"
)

func main() {
var num int64 = 8
for _, divisors := range factoring(num, 1) {
fmt.Println(num, "=", stringify(divisors))
}
}

func stringify(divisors []int64) string {
s := make([]string, len(divisors))
for i, v := range divisors {
s[i] = strconv.FormatInt(v, 10)
}

return strings.Join(s, "x")
}

func factoring(n int64, min int64) [][]int64 {
if n <= 1 {
return [][]int64{[]int64{n}}
}

var result [][]int64
var max = int64(math.Sqrt(float64(n)))

for d := min; d <= max; d++ {
if n%d == 0 {
for _, divisors := range factoring(n/d, 2) {
divisors = append([]int64{d}, divisors...)
result = append(result, divisors)
}
}
}

return append(result, []int64{n})
}

}

static boolean use1 = false;
static void work(int n, ArrayList<Integer> list) {

if (n == 0)
return;

if (n == 1) {
if (use1 == false) {
list.add(1);
}

StringBuilder ans = new StringBuilder();
for (int i = 0; i < list.size() - 1; i++) {
ans.append(list.get(i)).append("*");
}
ans.append(list.get(list.size()-1));
System.out.println(ans.toString());
return;
}

for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {

if (i == 1 && use1 == false) {
use1 = true;

newlist.add(i);
work(n , newlist);
use1 = false;
continue;
}

if (i == 1)
continue;

if (n % i == 0) {
ArrayList<Integer> newlist = (ArrayList<Integer>)list.clone();
newlist.add(i);
work(n / i, newlist);
}
}
}

public class Session5_2 {

private static long targetNum = 8;
public static void main(String[] args) {
get(targetNum, new ArrayList<>());
}

/**
* å› æ•°åˆ†è§£ï¼Œå¹¶æ‰“å°æ‰€æœ‰å¯èƒ½çš„åˆ†è§£ç»“æœ
*
* @param num å¾…åˆ†è§£çš„å› æ•°
* @param factors åˆ†è§£çš„å› å­é›†åˆ
*/
private static void get(long num, ArrayList<Long> factors) {
// åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰å› æ•°æ˜¯å¦å¯å†åˆ†ï¼Œä¸å¯å†åˆ†åˆ™éå†å› å­é›†é€‰æ‹©ç¬¦åˆçš„è¾“å‡ºï¼Œå¦åˆ™ç»§ç»­å› æ•°åˆ†è§£
if (num == 1) {
if (factors.size() == 0) {
System.out.println("1");
return;
}
// å½“å‰å› æ•°å·²ç»ä¸å¯å†åˆ†ï¼Œéå†åˆ†è§£çš„å› å­é›†åˆï¼Œè¾“å‡ºç¬¦åˆç»“æœå› å­
StringBuffer strBuffer = new StringBuffer("");
long result = 1;
for (int ix = 0; ix < factors.size(); ix++) {
long factor = factors.get(ix);
result *= factor;
strBuffer.append(factor);
if (ix < factors.size() - 1) {
strBuffer.append(" X ");
}
}
if (result == targetNum) {
System.out.println(strBuffer.toString());
}
} else {
// éå†æ‰€æœ‰å¯èƒ½çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œè¿›è¡Œåˆ†è§£
for (int factor = 1; factor <= num; factor++) {
// å½’çº³æ³•ä¸­n>=2ä¹‹åçš„æƒ…å½¢ï¼Œå› æ•°åˆ†è§£æ—¶ä»2å¼€å§‹
if ((factors.size() > 0) && (factor == 1)) {
continue;
}
// å‘åˆ†è§£çš„å› å­é›†åˆä¸­æ·»åŠ å½“å‰æ‰€é€‰æ‹©çš„å› å­
ArrayList<Long> newFactors = (ArrayList<Long>) factors.clone();
newFactors.add((long) factor);
// ä½¿ç”¨å½“å‰æ‰€é€‰æ‹©çš„å› å­åˆ†è§£å½“å‰å› æ•°
get(num / factor, newFactors);
}
}
}
}

package com.renrenche.jike.mathematical.basic.course.programmers;

import java.util.*;

/**
* @author jiangqiaonan
* @date 2019/3/17
*/

public class Factorization {

private Set<Integer> makeUpList;

private List<ArrayList<Integer>> result = new ArrayList<>();

/**
* è·å–æ‰€æœ‰çš„å› å­
*/
private void decompose(int number) {
if (number <= 1) {
throw new RuntimeException("number è‡³å°‘å¤§äº1");
}
makeUpList = new HashSet<>();
int i = 2;
int product = number;
while (i <= product) {
makeUpList.add(product);
if (product % i == 0) {
product = product / i;
makeUpList.add(i);
continue;
}
i++;
}
makeUpList.add(1);
}

/**
* æ•°æ®å¤„ç†è¿‡ç¨‹
*/
private void getAllMakeUp(int number, ArrayList<Integer> result) {
if (number <= 1) {
if (result.size() > 1) {
this.result.add(result);
}
}
for (int a : makeUpList) {
if (a == 1 && result.contains(1)) {
continue;
}
if (number % a == 0) {
ArrayList<Integer> arrayList = (ArrayList<Integer>) result.clone();
arrayList.add(a);
getAllMakeUp(number / a, arrayList);
}
}
}

public List<ArrayList<Integer>> factorize(int number) {
this.decompose(number);
this.getAllMakeUp(number, new ArrayList<>());
return this.result;
}


public static void main(String[] args) {
Factorization factorization = new Factorization();
factorization.factorize(12).forEach(System.out::println);
}
}

import java.util.*;
public class Factorization {
private Set<Integer> makeUpList;
private List<ArrayList<Integer>> result = new ArrayList<>();

/**
* å› å¼åˆ†è§£
*/
private void decompose(int number) {
if (number <= 1) {
throw new RuntimeException("number è‡³å°‘å¤§äº1");
}
makeUpList = new HashSet<>();
int i = 2;
int product = number;
while (i <= product) {
if (product % i == 0) {
product = product / i;
makeUpList.add(i);
continue;
}
i++;
}
makeUpList.add(1);
}

/**
* æ•°æ®å¤„ç†è¿‡ç¨‹
*/
private void getAllMakeUp(int number, ArrayList<Integer> result) {
if (number <= 1) {
return;
}
for (int a : makeUpList) {
if (a == 1 && result.contains(1)) {
continue;
}
if (number % a == 0) {
ArrayList<Integer> arrayList = (ArrayList<Integer>) result.clone();
arrayList.add(a);

}

if (!result.isEmpty()) {

arrayList.add(index, number);
this.result.add(arrayList);
}
}
}

this.decompose(number);
this.getAllMakeUp(number, new ArrayList<>());

import java.util.*;

public class Factorization {

private Set<Integer> makeUpList;

private List<ArrayList<Integer>> result = new ArrayList<>();

/**
* å› å¼åˆ†è§£
*/
private void decompose(int number) {
if (number <= 1) {
throw new RuntimeException("number è‡³å°‘å¤§äº1");
}
makeUpList = new HashSet<>();
int i = 2;
int product = number;
while (i <= product) {
if (product % i == 0) {
product = product / i;
makeUpList.add(i);
continue;
}
i++;
}
makeUpList.add(1);
}

/**
* æ•°æ®å¤„ç†è¿‡ç¨‹
*/
private void getAllMakeUp(int number, ArrayList<Integer> result) {
if (number <= 1) {
return;
}
for (int a : makeUpList) {
if (a == 1 && result.contains(1)) {
continue;
}
if (number % a == 0) {
ArrayList<Integer> arrayList = (ArrayList<Integer>) result.clone();
arrayList.add(a);
getAllMakeUp(number / a, arrayList);
}
}

if (!result.isEmpty()) {
for (int index = 0; index <= result.size(); index++) {
ArrayList<Integer> arrayList = (ArrayList<Integer>) result.clone();
arrayList.add(index,number);
this.result.add(arrayList);
}
}
}

public List<ArrayList<Integer>> factorize(int number) {
this.decompose(number);
this.getAllMakeUp(number, new ArrayList<>());
return this.result;
}

System.out.println("factorization = " + factorization.factorize(8));
}
}

@Data
class Award {
// å·²ç»è¾¾åˆ°maxçš„list
List<List<Integer>> done;

// è¿˜å¯ä»¥ç»§ç»­åŠ æŒçš„listï¼Œindex=0æ˜¯æ€»å’Œ
List<ArrayList<Integer>> doing;
}

@Data
class Bonus {

List<Integer> enums = Arrays.asList(1, 2, 5, 10);

public Award compute(int k, int max) {
List<ArrayList<Integer>> doing = new ArrayList<>();
List<List<Integer>> done = new ArrayList<>();
if (k == 1) {
Award award = new Award();
for (int prize : enums) {
if (prize < max) {
ArrayList<Integer> temp = new ArrayList<>();
temp.add(prize);
temp.add(prize);
doing.add(temp);
} else if (prize == max) {
done.add(Collections.singletonList(prize));
}
}
award.setDoing(doing);
award.setDone(done);
return award;
}

// è·å–ä¸Šä¸€è½®çš„ä¿¡æ¯
Award award = compute(k - 1, max);

// ä¸Šä¸€è½®ä¿¡æ¯+æœ¬è½®ä¿¡æ¯
for (int prize : enums) {
award.getDoing().forEach(temp -> {
int sum = temp.get(0) + prize;
if (sum > max) {
return;
}

ArrayList<Integer> tempAward = (ArrayList<Integer>) temp.clone();
tempAward.set(0, sum);
tempAward.add(prize);
if (sum == max) {
tempAward.remove(0);
done.add(tempAward);
return;
}
doing.add(tempAward);
});
}
award.getDone().addAll(done);
award.setDoing(doing);
return award;
}
}

def factorization(num):
if(num <= 0):
return []
elif(num == 1):
return [[1]]
else:
res = []
res.append([1, num])
for i in range(2, num + 1):
if((num % i) == 0):
temp_res = factorization(num // i)
for j in range(len(temp_res)):
temp_res[j].append(i)
res = res + temp_res
return deEquivalentLists(res)

def arrange(ls):
if len(ls) == 0:
return [[]]
elif len(ls) == 1:
return [ls]
else:
res = []
for i in range(len(ls)):
for arr_res in arrange(ls[:i] + ls[i + 1:]):
res.append([ls[i]] + arr_res)
return res


def deEquivalentLists(lists):
res = []
for ls in lists:
ls.sort()
if ls not in res:
res.append(ls)
return res


def deDuplicatedLists(lists):
res = []
for ls in lists:
if ls not in res:
res.append(ls)
return res

function recursion(n, result) {
if (Number.isInteger(n) && n > 1) {
for (var i = n; i > 1; i--) {

newResult.push(i);
recursion(n / i, newResult);
}
}
else if (n === 1) {

}
else {
return;
}
}

}
}

return
}

}

func countResult(total int) int {
if total < 0 {
return 0
}

return 1
}

result += countResult(total - cash[i])
}
return result
}

bool isExisted(vector<int> &array, int target) {

for (auto iter = array.begin(); iter != array.end(); ++iter) {
if (*iter == target) return true;
}
return false;
}

void decomposeInteger(int target, vector<int> &result) {
if (target == 1) {
cout << " product = ";
for (unsigned int i = 0; i < result.size()-1; ++i) {
cout << result.at(i) << " x ";
}
cout << result.back() << endl;
return;
} else {
for (int i = 1; i <= target; ++i) {
if (target % i > 0 || (isExisted(result, 1) && i == 1)) continue;
vector<int> rs = result;
rs.push_back(i);
decomposeInteger(target/i, rs);
}
}
}

function product($product, array $params)
{
if ($product == 1) {
if (! in_array(1, $params)) {
$params[] = 1;
}
print_r($params);
} else {
for ($i = 1; $i <= $product; $i++) {
if ($i == 1 && in_array(1, $params)) {
continue;
}
if ($product % $i != 0) {
continue;
}
$nextParams = $params;
$nextParams[] = $i;
product($product / $i, $nextParams);
}
}
}

private static void getPrime(int n) {
int size = (int) Math.sqrt(n);
for (int i = 1; i <= size; i++) {
if (n % i == 0) {

PRIMES.add(n / i);
}
}

#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

void printRes(vector<int> result)
{
int size = result.size();

if(size == 0)
cout << 1 << " " << 1;
else
{
for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
cout << result[i] << " ";

if(size == 1)
cout << 1;
}
cout << endl;
}

void solve(int n, vector<int> res, bool haveOne, int &total)
{
if(n == 1)
{
printRes(res);
total++;
return;
}

for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) //method 1
{
if(haveOne && i == 1)
continue;

if(n % i == 0)
{
if(i == 1)
haveOne = true;

res.push_back(i);
n = n / i;
solve(n, res, haveOne, total);
n = n * i;

if(res[res.size() - 1] == 1)
haveOne = false;

res.pop_back();
}
}
}

int main()
{
int a;
while(cin >> a)
{
assert(a > 0);
vector<int> result;
int count = 0;

cout << "All cases of decomposition of integer " << a << " are :" << endl;
solve(a, result, false, count);

cout << "All methods for decomposition of integer " << a << " is " << count << endl;
cout << endl;
}
return 0;
}

/**
*
* @param decomposedObject å¾…åˆ†è§£çš„æ•°å­—
* @param combination åˆ†è§£æ•°å­—çš„ç»„åˆ
* @param containOne ç»„åˆä¸­æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»åŒ…å«1
*/
@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
public static void computeCombination(long decomposedObject, ArrayList<Long> combination, boolean containOne) {
if(combination==null) {
combination = new ArrayList<Long>();
}
if(decomposedObject==1) { // ç­‰äº1è¯´æ˜ç»„åˆæ»¡è¶³éœ€æ±‚
if(containOne) { // å·²ç»åŒ…å«1ï¼Œä¸”å¾…åˆ†è§£æ•°ä¹Ÿä¸º1ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥æ‰“å°
printCombination(combination);
combinationCount++;
}else {
if(combination.size()>1) { // å¾…åˆ†è§£æ•°ä¸º1ï¼Œä¸”ç»„åˆæ•°å­—ä¸ªæ•°>1ï¼Œåˆ™æ‰“å°
printCombination(combination);
combinationCount++;
}
if(!containOne) { // å¾…åˆ†è§£æ•°ä¸º1ï¼Œä¸”ç»„åˆä¸­æ²¡æœ‰1ï¼Œåˆ™åŠ ä¸Š1å½¢æˆæ–°ç»„åˆ
combination.add(1L);
printCombination(combination);
combinationCount++;
}
}
return;
}else if(decomposedObject<1){ // å°äº1è¯´æ˜ä¸æ»¡è¶³
return;
}else {
for (long i=1; i<=decomposedObject; i++) { //TODO: æ­¤å¤„æœ‰ä¼˜åŒ–ç©ºé—´ï¼Œä¸å¿…è¦å…¨éƒ¨å¾ªç¯
ArrayList<Long> nextCombination = (ArrayList<Long>)combination.clone();
if(decomposedObject%i==0) {
long nextDecomposedObject = decomposedObject/i;
nextCombination.add(i);
if(i==1) {
if(containOne) { // å› å­ä¸º1ï¼Œç»„åˆä¸­å·²æœ‰1ï¼Œè·³è¿‡
continue;
}else { // å› å­ä¸º1ï¼Œç»„åˆä¸­æ²¡æœ‰1ï¼Œå°†1åŠ å…¥ç»„åˆ
computeCombination(nextDecomposedObject, nextCombination, true);
}
}else {
computeCombination(nextDecomposedObject, nextCombination, containOne);
}
}
}
}
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
computeCombination(8, null, false);
System.out.println("å…±æœ‰"+combinationCount+"ç§åˆ†è§£æ–¹å¼");
}

package org.fggv.arithmetic;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.HashSet;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Set;
public class Factorization {
/**
* è®¡ç®—numæ‰€æœ‰åˆ†è§£çš„å¯èƒ½ï¼Œä¸åŒ…å«1çš„æƒ…å†µï¼›
* @param num
* @return
*/
static Set<List<Integer>> factorization(int num) {
Set<List<Integer>> result = new HashSet<>();
result.add(Arrays.asList(num));
for (int i = 2; i <= num/2; i++) {
if (num % i == 0) {
int divisor1 = i, divisor2 = num / i;
Set<List<Integer>> divisor1divisors = factorization(divisor1);
Set<List<Integer>> divisor2divisors = factorization(divisor2);
for (List<Integer> d1 : divisor1divisors) {
for (List<Integer> d2 : divisor2divisors) {
List<Integer> r = new ArrayList<>(d1);
r.addAll(d2);
result.add(r);
}
}
}
}
return result;
}
public static void main(String[] args) {
System.out.println(factorization(1));
// [[1]]
System.out.println(factorization(2));
// [[2]]
System.out.println(factorization(3));
// [[3]]
System.out.println(factorization(4));
// [[2, 2], [4]]
System.out.println(factorization(5));
// [[5]]
System.out.println(factorization(6));
// [[3, 2], [2, 3], [6]]
System.out.println(factorization(7));
// [[7]]
System.out.println(factorization(8));
// [[2, 2, 2], [2, 4], [8], [4, 2]]
System.out.println(factorization(9));
// [[3, 3], [9]]
System.out.println(factorization(10));
// [[2, 5], [10], [5, 2]]
System.out.println(factorization(11));
// [[11]]
System.out.println(factorization(12));
// [[2, 3, 2], [4, 3], [2, 2, 3], [3, 2, 2], [3, 4], [2, 6], [12], [6, 2]]
System.out.println(factorization(13));
// [[13]]
System.out.println(factorization(14));
// [[2, 7], [7, 2], [14]]
System.out.println(factorization(15));
// [[3, 5], [15], [5, 3]]
System.out.println(factorization(16));
// [[4, 4], [2, 2, 4], [4, 2, 2], [2, 8], [8, 2], [2, 2, 2, 2], [16], [2, 4, 2]]
}
}

public static void recursion(long total, ArrayList<Long> result) {

if (total == 1) {
if (!result.contains(1L)){
ArrayList<Long> lastIsOneResult = (ArrayList<Long>) (result.clone());
lastIsOneResult.add(1L);
System.out.println(lastIsOneResult);
}
if(result.size()>1){
System.out.println(result);
}

return;
} else {
for (long i = 1; i <= total; i++) {
if ((i == 1) && result.contains(1L)) continue;
ArrayList<Long> newList = (ArrayList<Long>) (result.clone());
newList.add(Long.valueOf(i));
if (total % i != 0) {
continue;
}
recursion(total / i, newList);
}
}
}

void ret_reward(int arr[],vector<int> vec,int total_reward)
{
if (total_reward == 0)
{
for (auto val : vec)
cout << val << " ";
cout << endl;
return;
}
if (total_reward<0)
return;
for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
{
vec.push_back(arr[i]);
ret_reward(arr, vec, total_reward - arr[i]);
vec.pop_back();
}
}
void fenjie(vector<int> vec,int val,int des_num)
{
if (val == des_num)
{
for (auto v : vec)
cout << v << "*";
cout << endl;
}
if (val > des_num)
return;
for (int i = 1; i <= des_num; i++)
{
if (find(vec.begin(),vec.end(),1)==vec.end())
{
vec.push_back(i);
fenjie(vec, val*i, des_num);
vec.pop_back();
}
else if (vec.front() == 1&&i!=1)
{
vec.push_back(i);
fenjie(vec, val*i, des_num);
vec.pop_back();
}
}
}

for(int i = 2; i <= target; i++){
if(target % i == 0){
ArrayList<Integer> newResult = (ArrayList<Integer>) result.clone();
newResult.add(i);
divide(target/i, newResult);
}
}
}

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

int reward_list[4] = {1, 2, 5, 10};

struct result {
int array[10];
int index;
};

int total_kind = 0;
void reward(int rest_reward, struct result rst)
{
int i = 0;

if (rest_reward < 0)
return;
if (rest_reward == 0) {
printf("result %4d: ", ++total_kind);
for (i = 0; i < rst.index; ++i)
printf("%d ", rst.array[i]);
printf("\n");
} else {
for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
struct result cur_result = rst;
cur_result.array[cur_result.index] = reward_list[i];
++cur_result.index;
reward(rest_reward - reward_list[i], cur_result);
}
}
}

int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
int total_reward = 0;
struct result rst;

if (argc != 2) {
printf("Usage: %s total_reward\n", argv[0]);
return -1;
}
total_reward = atoi(argv[1]);
memset(&rst, 0, sizeof(rst));
reward(total_reward, rst);

return 0;
}

public static Integer hope = 8;
public static void divide(Integer calculate, ArrayList<Integer> factor) {
if (calculate > hope) {
return;
} else if (calculate.compareTo(hope) == 0) {
StringBuilder stringBuilder0 = new StringBuilder(hope + "=1*"); //å‰ç¼€åŠ ä¸Š1*
StringBuilder stringBuilder1 = new StringBuilder(hope + "="); //åŸæœ¬å½¢å¼
StringBuilder stringBuilder2 = new StringBuilder(hope + "="); //åç¼€åŠ ä¸Š*1
for (Integer fact : factor) {
stringBuilder0.append(fact + "*");
stringBuilder1.append(fact + "*");
stringBuilder2.append(fact + "*");
}
stringBuilder0.deleteCharAt(stringBuilder0.length() - 1);
stringBuilder1.deleteCharAt(stringBuilder1.length() - 1);
stringBuilder2.append("1");
stringBuilder0.append(";");
stringBuilder1.append(";");
stringBuilder2.append(";");
System.out.println(stringBuilder0.toString());
System.out.println(stringBuilder1.toString());
System.out.println(stringBuilder2.toString());
}
for (Integer i = 2; i < hope; ++i) {
ArrayList<Integer> newFactor = (ArrayList<Integer>) (factor.clone());
newFactor.add(i);
divide(i * calculate, newFactor);
}
}

//æ‰“å° 1* è‡ªèº«çš„å½¢å¼

divide(1, new ArrayList<Integer>());
//æ‰“å°è‡ªèº«*1çš„å½¢å¼
System.out.println(hope + "=" + hope + "*1;");
}
